name: The House Always Wins
description:
Sometimes it seems like some people get all the luck...

Well now that someone is you. As fey with the power to manipulate the odds and read the minds of others you have been captured and tasked with running a game of dice at a local casino.

Whilst you can change the odds in favour of the house or the players this will have an impact of those who won or lost...

Can you earn your freedom from the casino, at what cost to those around you will it come?

Made in 48 hours by two people for the GMTK2022 game jam - "Roll of the dice"
